title: We could really use a new item that builds through Brutalizer
body:
I've just played an ARAM game as Pantheon, and as we started the game, I was like:

"Okay, gonna take Brutalizer and then the BC.....wait fk, BC doesnt build through Brutalizer anymore".

I got so messed up with my starting builds that I have to split with {{item:3070}} {{item:3134}} {{item:3155}} . It's really inconvenient that now Brutalizer builds only stick to just the one non-jungling item{{item:3142}} . I hope Rito would consider making more items that paths through Brutalizer, instead of just Ghostblade.

Most "hybrids" aren't that hybrid anyway. They pick one build and stick with it, like AP Akali, AP Jax, AD Jax, AP Kayle... etc. The thing is that most hybrid builds aren't viable because the hybrid items aren't actually better than a build you stack one stat. Gunblade is niche at best, and they even tried to gear it toward Deathfire Grasp champions, and even that didn't work out. Guinsoo is... Guinsoo. If a champion has an overpowered hybrid kit, usually you'd get more power by sticking with one stat more than the other by a large amount.

Because it makes more sense that BC builds from a hammer than {{champion:57}} 's left arm.

The Brutalizer itself is in kind of a bad position, design-wise. It gives 3 powerful stats for AD casters (AD, CDR, Flat Pen) on a ridiculously low cost. You can't really add much more to a tier-3 item that builds out of it without making it ridiculously powerful. Youmuu's can get away with it because it's super cheap and primarily bought for its active rather than the stat upgrade; even then, it can fall off quite heavily. Even then, a lot of champs build Brutalizer for the massive early spike and sit onto it until they sell it late game.

I think Brutalizer should really be split into 2 items: 1 that gives AD+CDR, and 1 that gives AD+Flat Pen. That would open up a lot of opportunities for items with interesting passives/actives IMO.

We really DO need another item with Brutalizer...I used to like having the early armor pen due to it being cheaper than a whole item. You could build brutalizer....and leave it at that until later before having to finish building it into a black cleaver. Now if you build it...you can only head towards a Youmu's which I dont hate...but I dont like the item on all champs that go the black cleaver route. phage is nice....kindlegem is nice...both give hp...good! but where's my armor pen!? I gotta wait till late game to have armor pen and by then people already have enough armor to where it's useful but can't be used as much as before. In lane you could build a brutalizer and do enough damage against tanky champs who built armor. Now they build armor and start fighting back as though they had more AD than you O.O! makes it harder to fight back. The other day I was playing top lane...and started owning. Went around 4/0 just to suddenly notice that the enemy had built some armor. Thought to myself that I should still have no problem as I had more farm and more items. Turns out we were on "equal" ground now. He was 0/4 and less farm and was fighting back....neither of us got any ganks and as I said I had more farm/items lol when I had brutalizer before. Things would often be easier. Don't always need it but I say that having it there is a good counter against tanks. I didn't regain my lead that game until I finished my black cleaver. I was then FINALLY able to fight back like I had before he built armor. Please....Riot we need something as good as Black cleaver to build onto brutalizer or possibly give some armor pen to another item?
Actually the armor pen from BC is more effective later on in the game as it remove more armor the more armor the opponent has (and it has no early game flat armor pen)
